inclusion.criterion: Calculated 5 year CVD risk of 15% or greater
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to any of the components of the polypill
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The treating doctor considers that changing a participant's cardiovascular medications would put the participant at risk
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery, which may require medication changes. However, the patient's LDL-C level is very high (545 mg/dL), which may indicate a need for lipid-lowering medications.
